title: Ginger cinema slide
creator_credit: Fox Film Corporation and Lewis Seiler
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: A lovable Spitfire Ginger with Jane Withers and Jackie Searl Gunn Slide for General Exhibition The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736,
